entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
